system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Jovian-Pattern Gun Servitor
Apt: None
system.descriptionText:
Jovian-Pattern Gun Servitor Primary Function. Servitor Comrade in Cohesion makes Standard Ranged Attack, Semi-Auto Burst, or Full Auto Burst with one of its weapons against a target within weapon range.
Attack Orders have Attack Action Subtype, counts as Player's Attack for the turn.

description.value: Jovian-Pattern Gun Servitor Primary Function.
